thread.title: Detroit Tigers and Red Wings owner Mike Ilitch dies at 87 | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Detroit Tigers and Red Wings owner Mike Ilitch dies at 87 | Daily Mail Online

author: Associated Press
title: Detroit Tigers and Red Wings owner Mike Ilitch dies at 87 | Daily Mail Online
text: Little Caesars creator and Detroit Red Wings and Tigers owner dies aged 87 after amassing a fortune worth $6BILLION Mike Ilitch, 87, died at a local hospital in the Detroit area on Friday Ilitch was regarded as a visionary who set the tone for his company, Little Caesars, and his family The son of immigrants from Macedonia, Ilitch founded the successful pizza franchise in suburban Detroit in 1959 Ilitch also kept sports teams in Detroit even though the city was struggling economically to attract business Published: 00:53 GMT, 11 February 2017 | Updated: 02:38 GMT, 11 February 2017 81 shares
